Sentencas: The development of high-performance cathodes with low polarization resistance and good tolerance to CO2 are important issues for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Enhanced oxygen reduction reaction of LaSrCoO4-Ce0.9Mn0.1O2 composite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, we synthesized LaSrCoO4-Ce0.9Mn0.1O2 (LSCO4CMO) composite cathode materials by the citric acid-nitrate method.
Titulo: Enhanced oxygen reduction reaction of LaSrCoO4-Ce0.9Mn0.1O2 composite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The composite cathode sintered at 950 degrees C for 4 h shows large porous morphology and superior electrochemical activity of oxygen reduction reaction (ORR).
Titulo: Enhanced oxygen reduction reaction of LaSrCoO4-Ce0.9Mn0.1O2 composite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Electrochemical properties analysis suggests that LSCO4-35 wt% CMO (L-35C) exhibits the lowest polarization resistance (R-p) at 800 degrees C and the value of R-p is 0.14 Omega cm(2) which is far lower than that of pure LSCO4 (0.77 Omega cm(2)).
Titulo: Enhanced oxygen reduction reaction of LaSrCoO4-Ce0.9Mn0.1O2 composite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is found that the LSCO4-CMO has unique microstructure and more active sites for ORR.
Titulo: Enhanced oxygen reduction reaction of LaSrCoO4-Ce0.9Mn0.1O2 composite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, the doping of CMO offers more oxygen ions transport channels as the concentration of oxygen vacancies increases.
Titulo: Enhanced oxygen reduction reaction of LaSrCoO4-Ce0.9Mn0.1O2 composite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The study of the effect of oxygen partial pressure on Rp reveals that as the temperature rises, the rate of dissociation of oxygen molecules is significantly accelerated, indicating that the charge transfer of oxygen atoms becomes the main rate-limiting step.
Titulo: Enhanced oxygen reduction reaction of LaSrCoO4-Ce0.9Mn0.1O2 composite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A high oxygen reduction catalytic activity and excellent CO2 tolerance were demonstrated in L-35C by O-2-TPD and CO2-TPD tests, making LSCO4-CMO a potential candidate for SOFC cathode.
Titulo: Enhanced oxygen reduction reaction of LaSrCoO4-Ce0.9Mn0.1O2 composite cathode for solid oxide fuel cells
